* atypical 非典型
    # a/typ/ical
    # pre;a=without
    # SARS is an atypical form of pneumonia.
* belief <-> believe; f/v 互換;核心語意「相信」、和「愛」同源
    # belief 相信、信念;disbelief 不信 
    # It is important for every leader to have belief that they will succeed.
                                                信念
    # believe 相信、信任
    # Tim's parents believed that he would take care of them when they reached old age.
                      相信
